assetProfile.address2: 414, Veer Savarkar Marg Near Siddhivinayak Temple Prabhadevi
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company Limited provides various general insurance products in India. The company offers insurance products, such as motor, travel, car, two wheeler, crop, cattle, health, fire, personal accident, fire, marine, workmen compensation, rural, engineering, liability, and home and cyber insurance products, as well as provides reinsurance services. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Mumbai, India. ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company Limited is a subsidiary of ICICI Bank Limited.
